channel.title: android on claudioscheer
channel.description: Recent content in android on claudioscheer

item.title: Android Virtual Devices (AVD) in command line
item.description: Install dependencies $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/sdkmanager "system-images;android-28;google_apis;x86_64" "emulator" Create AVD $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/avdmanager create avd --force -n Nexus6P --package "system-images;android-28;google_apis;x86_64" --device "Nexus 6P" Run AVD $ANDROID_HOME/emulator/emulator -avd Nexus6P Delete AVD $ANDROID_HOME/tools/bin/avdmanager delete avd -n Nexus6P
